messages.title: Vote Smart
messages.content: Vote Conservative Vote Democracy Remove the deadlock

keyPolicies.policyDescription: 50,000 more nurses for the NHS, 50 million more GP surgery appointments
Australian style point based system to control immigration
Increasing per pupil funding for every child

issues.education: Increasing per pupil funding for every child
issues.health: 50,000 more nurses for the NHS, 50 million more GP surgery appointments
issues.immigration: Australian style point based system to control immigration

leaflet.personalStatement: Natalie works in the NHS as a nurse practitioner in the Accident and Emergency department. She is a Governor at a local hospital and was a previously elected member of the council holding the position as shadow health cabinet lead. Natalie is a strong community campaigner and fundraiser.

politicalExperience.role: Nurse Practitioner, Governor at a local hospital, previously elected member of the council
